website_summaries.verdict: One of the most effective all-around foggers on the market, for spaces large and small.
pros: The canisters cover a wide area so you need fewer of these foggers to cover a wide area than you would need with some of its competitors
Rids your home of a host of pests, from small ants up to large flying roaches and spiders
cons: You may need to do at least two treatments to have consistent long-term benefits from this item

customer_reviews.title: Bugs love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I swear I have twice the fleas and spiders in my house 2 days after using this stuff. I even put a can directly under a big spider's web in my basement. That spider was here to greet me when I got back home to open my windows. I pretty much paid $30 to get all the bugs in my house stoned. Now they have told their friends, and everyone is invited over.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as they once were..
customer_reviews.text: Have a massive cricket,roach and water bug problem as I live near a swamp. I have tried everything out there in the fogger world and this is the only one that seems to kill 'em...and that after about 3 cans.One star off for that but 4 for the fact that this does work,it just takes alot. Well worth the price. A case a season is a small price to pay compared to the local exterminator girl.REVISED! This new case is almost useless as the bugs seem oblivious to the poison,which,btw,made me pretty sick,,,although the bugs seemed to like it. Forget about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Turbinado

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, hire a professional
customer_reviews.text: What started out as a small flea problem has escalated to the point I have to hide a professional. I bought this in the hopes of getting a small flea problem under control..... I have used these in my house TWICE since I received them and they don't seem to have ANY affect on the fleas. The problem actually seems worse since setting these off, I followed all the directions to a T. I Would not use again or recommend to anyone, I'd you have a flea problem save yourself and just call a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, enough for a whole house.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a musty old house with a daddy long-legs problem. There were enough canisters in this pack to cover my attic, basement and the rest of my home. After two weeks, the difference is dramatic. I haven't seen a spider since - at least, not a live one.
customer_reviews.author: James in D.C.

customer_reviews.title: works!!!
customer_reviews.text: it works. 6 pack works for my 1200 sq ft house. each can apparently covers 158 sq ft a can which equates to 2000 cu ft per the can. seen dead palmetto bugs immediately after 2 hours to open all the windows. if tou have a heavier infestation. i recommend spraying your baseboards and other areas with ammonia and water. oh and windowsills. spiders usually are not affected by pesticides that im aware of. but they will NOT like the ammonia. if you use these bombs, it will kill their food source such as ants and mites. etc.
customer_reviews.author: Duke L. Rogers II

customer_reviews.title: 100% for camel crickets.
customer_reviews.text: I had a major camel cricket problem. Hundreds of them. Tried a few different products to get rid of them and none worked. I used all six cans of these for a 2300 sqft open ranch. 3 inside and 3 under in the crawling space. Started the fogger in the morning, left for work, and then vented the house for a few hours after work before returning home. No heavy residual odor or film. Haven't seen a SINGLE cricket since and it's been two days. Worked as advertised for camel crickets.
customer_reviews.author: A.Texas.Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my 3 car detached garage.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 car garage detached from my home. It was full of spiders, mice, and all matter of bugs. I set off all 6 and closed the doors. Next day I was vermin free. It worked extremely well. I'm sure I will have to eventually repeat but I live in the country and its expected. This helped me win the battle...for now.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Had to order on line because I could NOT find in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My carpenter first used them in our house and this product works for months. We live out in the country and prefer not to hire bug men because of butterflies and bees. This works within the home. It is simple to use and works for months. Make sure you are leaving for the day as the aerosoles start working immediately. I started with the basement and worked my way up and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work Great in small areas
customer_reviews.text: These work Great in small areas. My rental had fleas SO Bad after the tenants moved out that it took me a couple of rounds of these bombs to get rid of the fleas. But, in all fairness, it was a Horrible infestation. These work real good for Spider's!!! Yuck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I have used Spectracide for decades and have gone out of my way to look for it. I now know why it's not on anyone's shelf anymore. Bombed the house and the spring bugs not only survived, but 4 bites later I think we saw some spiders actually laughing. A box of Raid Hotshots took care of the problem. We're now bug and spider free.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: top will not stay snapped in
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how well the chemical works because the top spray button will not stay snapped in on some of these. A total waste of your money. The same thing happened with another brand. They all seem to have this faulty snap in spray button. How can companies keep selling something like this? I give up until i can find a different spray button.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Bombed my bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Had spiders, fruit flies, and crickets, and they were getting on my nerves. Bombed the house twice, and now we have no spiders, fruit flies and even the crickets are gone! Moral to this story? Get enough to do at least a couple applications to get the pests that are still in the egg stage when you do the first application. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: sodakroger

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: This killed some of the bugs we were hoping for. But our purpose for using these foggers was fleas. Unfortunately we found at least 5 live fleas in the house that very same day after bombing. And we all have new bites. We used 12 cans in our 22sq ft. house, more than enough. We followed all the directions and precautions. It was a lot of work for a total waste of time and money. We're trying diatomaceous earth next.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Monica

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing better...
customer_reviews.text: I use a variety of the Spectracide products. The fogger is my go to for storage units and apartment hallways. I also tend to use it before I move into a new place. And...it keeps working for months and months. Right now, there is no better fogger, and the best for your money regarding size and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My Sons Dog Brought Flees In The House And It Was So Bad.We Tried Every Home Remedy We Could Find And Was To The Point Of Burning The House Down. This Worked Very Good We Still Ended Up Ripping Up Carpet In His Room But We Could Sit Without Flees Getting On Us. So I Would Recomend This Product
customer_reviews.author: frankie3

customer_reviews.title: Not working for fleas
customer_reviews.text: Recently we got fleas in our house, I have cat and a bunny, I showered my cat very well and checked she was clean, I even bathed my bunny and cut his hair. make sure there is no flea on their body, then I took them out of the house and fogger the whole house with all the 6 cans I bought, one on each room. after we came back, I imagined all fleas dead, however the 2nd day after I came back from work, I check my bunny, I found more fleas and my cat scratch herself. I foggered my car too. I still feel something crawling on my feet. This doesn't work at all.......
customer_reviews.author: Aishah

customer_reviews.title: Spiders Still Dancing
customer_reviews.text: I lined up 1000 tiny caskets and bombed a small garage twice and the spiders have not moved out. They seem perfectly content hanging around and daring me to try a third bomb. It came with 4 (or maybe 6) so I'll do them all. It's not like I'm going to save the stuff for a rainy day. Did I mention I REALLY hate spiders and now I stuck with 1000 caskets!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: MeLori

customer_reviews.title: did my garden sheds and travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: These were a better price than the name brands bust basically the same thing. Came undamaged and deployed properly. Used in garden sheds and travel trailer. Wasp nest in garden shed is no more. I imagine there are less propane spiders in my trailer but I can't prove it.
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Product did release completely in 3 out of 6 units
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but at least 3 out of the six foggers in this package did not completely release their contents, so fogging was less than effective and required an additional purchase @ local store. So can't comment on the effectiveness of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY TOXIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I follow the directions. After fogging I left the windows open for 2 whole days. Washed floors, walls, everything that has possibly been exposed to it. Still my dog and me vomited for 3 days and it’s been a week now but I have headache as long as I’m inside my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luca

customer_reviews.title: Had to Reapply
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it helped with some insects in the garage but had to use a couple of times before I noticed a difference with the spiders. Seemed to not make a difference with a single application.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: A Killer Was Here
customer_reviews.text: This killed anything moving. It does have a strong smell that lingered for some time. It was a great price. It worked and that's all that matters. If you have any insects this will get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to worked fine
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to work as well as other foggers. Did not help with Scorpion problem so I had to go with another product. For general spiders and such, this stuff seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $40
customer_reviews.text: I bought the four pack of these, I have a two story house and wanted to make sure it killed all the cockroaches, I even put three in the kitchen, the most serious location of infestation, and none of the cockroaches died! I still have the crawling all over and didn't find any dead ones. This product does not work against cockroaches like it claims. Big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Walker

customer_reviews.title: Can’t kill termites in my shed
customer_reviews.text: Are use this in a small shed. three times now. I cover the vents. I taped the door shut top, bottom, sides. Still have bugs. Every time. I’m using this in such a small space, with no hidden cavities, I really hoped it would kill more bugs. I guess it’s not meant for this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dreifort

customer_reviews.title: This thing is very useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very useful and easy to use. I only use it in my office, not home and the next day when I come in I do have to leave the window open because there is a smell that I personally don't like, but it's not a big deal for me and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Butyrski

customer_reviews.title: great product especially the price
customer_reviews.text: great product especially the price .bought new home in PA that wasn't lived in for over a year .these foggers cleared house every bug was dead and no smell afterwoods
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: whaaaaa??
customer_reviews.text: used 2 cans for my less than 2000" mobile home, 4 hours later, the roaches were still having a party in the kitchen cabinets. Instructions said ONE can per 2000 sq ft. I expected my double dose of roach poison to kill at least most of them. A waste of our time.
customer_reviews.author: sharyne w.

customer_reviews.title: No live bugs
customer_reviews.text: Watched 2 earwigs die. Rescued a spider no idea if he made it or not but he didn’t seem too sluggish. Can vouch though this stuff does kill bugs. This in combination with a legit (not all the fake) audio bug repellents means my apartment hasn’t had a single bug even though its summer.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: A couple of months ago I was starting to see ...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of months ago I was starting to see fleas in my house. I ordered these bombs before anything got out of control. They worked very well and I will purchase them again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this product almost a month ago and I haven't seen a spider since! It is very effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Booooommmm the roaches
customer_reviews.text: Booooommmmm!! All roaches get the hell out of my vision! Very fresh feeling without any roach!!
customer_reviews.author: BobDylan078

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was very easy to use and performed with great effectiveness. It is prudent to give it appropriate time for the odor to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Earl C

customer_reviews.title: great stuff here folks...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before with very good luck. I live in an apartment complex in southeast Texas and this works very well with roaches for me.
customer_reviews.author: setx77704

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. Better things out there.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product may have worked better if we had picked up one room a bit better (laundry room that had lots of blankets and clothes on the floor and in baskets that the fleas were probably able to hide in while the foggers were working). The rest of the house seemed to be pretty good, but the fleas made their way back in after about 2-3 days. Again, assuming it was from the back laundry room. Hard to tell. Does leave a little residue on hardwood floors. but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: dylan.v.magers

customer_reviews.title: Usless
customer_reviews.text: Useless after spraying all filighs was enjoying the space as if nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Lord lover

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with a large infestation of fruit flies in my home. These bug bombs did their job and cleaned my house out of those nasty lil opportunistic pests, and I'm sure other bugs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jones

customer_reviews.text: Did an ok job, going to have to do it one more time.
customer_reviews.author: TSM Shockwave

customer_reviews.title: easy to use- great value
customer_reviews.text: easy to use - did an entire condo - great value
customer_reviews.author: Alden Whitenack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, even when you use a ton.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all. Treated our entire house and our cat. Let the house sit closed up for a long time and aired out for two hours after that, as per the directions. Had fleas jumping on me as soon as we came back in the house (I’m very allergic), next morning was obviously completely infested still. Disappointed, thought that something would finally work.
customer_reviews.author: Haley L.

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: WE SET 3-5 OFTHEM IN BASEMENT WHEN LEAVING FOR A WEEKEND OUTING. VACUUM DEAD CRICKETS AND SPIDERS UPON RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: Heck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad flea problem which is diminished extremely
customer_reviews.author: Kenoth Whitstine

customer_reviews.title: All but the one... Bugs be gone
customer_reviews.text: Product work as it shoot as far as I can tell. Only disappointment one of the cans did not operate properly.
customer_reviews.author: oree crittenden

customer_reviews.title: works but you have to work hard and have to treat several times
customer_reviews.text: didn't work on the fleas very well. had to use 3 times plus spray and 7 dust outside. it was a bad infestation. the cold weather came and along with the dust and spray finally got em
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L Kesterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It did what it was supposed to do! I bought an old abandoned house.... Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Steverino

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price! Bought a new house ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price! Bought a new house and wanted to bomb it prior to moving in, came back the next morning to about 10 dead roaches (Gross!)
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Loera

customer_reviews.title: Waiste of your money
customer_reviews.text: Total waiste of money, set out total of 24 to kill fleas,,did nothing,mind you i have no cats or dogs to had a small problem with fleas from company i had for a visit their dog had fleas..been gone for a week..this stuff is a joke..gonna try raid in purple color,was told this was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: two weekends in a row and the bugs seem worse now than before
customer_reviews.text: Used twice, two weekends in a row and the bugs seem worse now than before. May be the weather change but you would think it would not get worse after using the foggers, it should have help prevent bugs from coming in when the weather changed.
customer_reviews.author: Illusions

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: It’s was easy to use but all in all it just pissed them off.
customer_reviews.author: Cory A.

customer_reviews.title: My spider killer
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my shed and outbuildings every 3 months,,.,its the only one that kills big sopiders as well as all other bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work but, it was a bad year for bug's in my area
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Product. Service. Respect. A VOICE.
customer_reviews.text: Twice this colossus fed-up has come in wrong. There is a second option that YOU offer, Amazon.com! The atomizer is incredible, but spectracide doesn't double-down the canisters for you to send half of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Beau Remington

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The fogger work great it really cleared out those bugs in the basement
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: fleas are tough as ar500 armor
customer_reviews.text: it killed most of the fleas, but most isn't good enough, after about 5 bombs over the coarse of 3 weeks in a specific room the fleas were all dead... but i cant help but think that the poison didnt do anything and that they died from starvation
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: It will KILL all bugs that YOU do not want in your home!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works and does what it says it will do. Great price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DrBarron

customer_reviews.title: all smoke no kill
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Fleas still hopping everywhere after use. Had to end up calling a pro. Wouldn't waste my time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I have used this before and like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. I have used this before and like it a lot. Good thing we don't get fleas often. But when I do this stuff works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bug killer
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with spider mites and other unwanted pests in my greenhouse. One treatment with this and they are all gone. I know it's meant for household use but it worked for me. I also use this in my shop to keep the bugs under control.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in my house
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in my house. I came home to Box Elder Beatles and Stink Bugs dead all over the house.

customer_reviews.title: like a previous post all this did was cause a ...
customer_reviews.text: like a previous post all this did was cause a lot of a major head ache cleaning your house after using something that only p!ssed the fleas off and they are worse than before

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t kill all bugs
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t kill everything. We even used more than was needed.

customer_reviews.title: Zero bug killed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all. Not even one single roach die. We even used 2 just for our small kitchen. Kill nothing just super strong smell after 8 hrs

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: The add said 1 case or 4 cases I received 6 cans - how does that work? cost per can $9 other vendors sell it for $2 per can. Not able to return or give amazon feedback!

customer_reviews.title: Don't  work
customer_reviews.text: I put 11 can off in my house less then 2 weeks ago and it did not work I wanted my money. I would like a refund I got to redo because did not work

customer_reviews.title: great value for smoking an entire house twice
customer_reviews.text: great value for smoking an entire house twice. I did my basement 3 times and the upstairs twice. killed the fleas, then the eggs pretty well. no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Controls ants, that I can tell you
customer_reviews.text: Used in the attic to control the ants walking around and it worked to kill them all. Happy with the product and results. If the ants come back next year...they will get the same treatment.

customer_reviews.text: great product and works well. Do this 2 times per year and no need for an exterminator. You do need to be out of the house for a day

customer_reviews.title: works pretty good still had a few after but bombed again ...

customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 boxes (6 cans each). I used 14 cans. house around 1700 square feet. I thought overkill is better. Anyway, I was rushing through the house activating the cans - holding my breath. I am fast and really rushing as sure didn't wan't make news headline of "idiot killed himself by suffocating with fogger". As I closed the door, I heard the foggers turning off. Say what? I didn't expect cans to turn off so soon. Was expecting at least 10 minutes. Later, I did see dead roaches but still saw many walking around in kitchen area. I had 3 cans just for kitchen. Guess it is not penetrating the crevasses.
customer_reviews.author: T Tong

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong. does a descent job.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product

customer_reviews.text: Roaches - Ran them off and came back within hours! Not 1 dead roach! Do not waste your money.

In the same day, I treated my cat and fogged my apt using 3 cans of spectracide (1000sq ft apt) and now a week later, my cat is still itching and I still have fleas in the apt.

customer_reviews.text: Had to fog twice for spiders but seemed to get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Valich

customer_reviews.title: Very useful smaller can size
customer_reviews.text: I love the Spectracide products and have used them for years since they work well. But this order I placed was for a 6 pack of smaller cans. For an average size room of a house these are just perfect. Getting a reduced amount of spray to unleash in various rooms is great. If you have really large rooms you might want to use two of these, one at each end of the room.

product_meta.title: Spectracide 100046128 Bug Stop Indoor Fogger, Insect Killer, 6/2-oz, Brown/A
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Case Pack of 1Spectracide bug stop indoor fogger kills on contact & Controls heavy insect infestations. This aerosol fogger kills crawling, flying & biting insects, including roaches, fleas, ants, brown dog ticks, mosquitoes, houseflies, silverfish, spiders & other listed insects. Spectracide bug stop indoor fogger dispenses a fine, penetrating mist that reaches deep into cracks & crevices to flush out & kill hidden bugs on contact. This multi-purpose fogger leaves no lingering odor or wet residue. Value Pack with 6-2 oz fogger cansper carton. When used as directed, The clear, non-staining formula will not harm drapes, upholstery, fabrics, carpeting, bedspreads, floor tiles, wood floors, linens, furniture, walls, clothing, ceilings, shades or blinds. One can treatsup to 2, 000 cu.'. Of space (A Room 15.5' X 16' With an 8-foot ceiling). works in 2 hours. Read the entire label before you Fog.

KILLS ON CONTACT: Kills roaches, fleas, ants, brown dog ticks, mosquitoes, houseflies, silverfish, spiders and other listed insects
NON-STAINING: Water-based, clear formula leaves no lingering odor or wet residue when used as directed – will not harm furniture, floors, walls or fabrics
FINE MIST: Penetrates deep into cracks and crevices to kill hidden bugs on contact
